snippet: The South Korean president is pushing for unification before younger generations lose interest, but China’s cooperation will be essential.
abstract: Editorial urges South Korean Pres Park Geun-hye to develop vision for reunification with North Korea; holds that reunification, while positive prospect in many ways, is being given up by South Korean youth as irrelevant or too costly; urges Park to seize opportunity to keep dream of reunification from fading.
lead_paragraph: The South Korean president is pushing for unification before younger generations lose interest, but China’s cooperation will be essential.
